name: Static Lagoon
description:
Abstract

Static Lagoon is a world without walls stuck in a loop. Windows of opportunity unveil new possibilities and change the course of the game. Only one leads to victory, the rest are just momentary distractions that cost you time.

Although the game is winnable, the objective of the game is not winning but for players to break out of the loop and find out what is worth breaking the system for.

Features

  • Compatible with Oculus Rift DK1 & DK2 - see the game's website for more details.
  • Never-seen-before aesthetic
  • Simple control system: mouse and spacebar only
